crusader.name: Cleansing Hand Crusader

corpse.name: Human corpse
corpse.description: Somehow avoiding the corrupting influence of the Sludgeworks, this creature retained its humanity until the bitter end.

crusader.description: A rank and file soldier of the Cleansing Hand. His armour is a mixture of leather padding and ring mail and he stance is confident.

purifier.name: Cleansing Hand Purifier

corpse.name: Human corpse
corpse.description: Somehow avoiding the corrupting influence of the Sludgeworks, this creature retained its humanity until the bitter end.

purifier.description: A cruel morningstar is held by this veteran crusader. Never again will the last bastion of purity be defiled by entropy.

duelist.name: Cleansing Hand Duelist

corpse.name: Human corpse
corpse.description: Somehow avoiding the corrupting influence of the Sludgeworks, this creature retained its humanity until the bitter end.

duelist.description: A duelist of the Ascetic Church sect of the Cleansing Hand. He stands statue-like, goading attacks with his alber stance.
